typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	primaryKey as string (vendor_id)
}
source(output(
		medallion as string,
		hack_license as string,
		vendor_id as string,
		pickup_datetime as string,
		payment_type as string,
		fare_amount as string,
		surcharge as string,
		mta_tax as string,
		tip_amount as string,
		tolls_amount as string,
		total_amount as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> FaresDataCSV
FaresDataCSV alterRow(updateIf($primaryKey == "VTS")) ~> AlterRow1
